page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT SURVEY
page.content: What do the Adults who live here work at. 1) Jack Brown:electrical contracter. 2) Mrs Halton:Teacher. 3) Bill Noble:Lorry driver. 4) Dorothy Noble : Waitress. 5) Harry & Ethel Dargarno :Hoteliers. 6) Stuart & Meryl Donald:Post Office. 7) Mrs Ann Duncan :School Cook. 8) Neil Booth :Grocery Food Buyer. 9) George & Eve Taylor :Food Store. 10) Ann Smith: Staff nurse. 11) Mr Smith :Farming Engineer. 12) Bobby Cow :Council Worker. 13) Mrs Milne :Part-time Hall Keeper. 14) Douglas Taylor :Painter. 15) Mr Hay : Engineer on the ST. Clair. 16) Mrs Anderson: Cleans Houses. 17) Mr Gladwyn:Helicopter Engineer. 18) Mrs Smith:School Bus Driver.
